original: intros a v H. unfold freeVarFormula, substituteFormula, betaFormula. simpl. intros H0. unfold freeVarTerm, var in H0. simpl in H0. apply In_betaFormula_subst_1_2 in H0. apply In_betaFormula_subst_1_2_0 in H0. destruct H0 as [H1 | [H2 | H3]]. - left; auto. - right. left; auto. - right. right; auto.
